title: The Watchers
description: Déjà vu has a face!Two inter-dimensional life forms seek the same dangerous, experimental device, a vortex generator that threatens to tear apart the very fabric of time and space.The Watchers most experienced agent, Gaia Hassani, must once again take human form to locate and destroy the device, by any means necessary, and erase all knowledge of its existence. Her foe, Terra, covets the generator for her own sinister ends, and will stop at nothing to attain it. Her vision for the device is as lethal and final as anything ever encountered by mankind.Gaia quickly discovers Terra is by magnitudes the most powerful and dangerous adversary she has ever encountered. Even the love and assistance of the inventor of the device, Bartholomew Cooksley and Gaia's unique para-normal abilities, prove wanting against Terra in a deadly battle across time to prevent the end of all life as we know it.
author: Russell Turney
